forum.content:
Fox新劇
講用科技死而服生 並異於常人強壯
第一集觀後覺得可續追

不過看到rules of engagement裡的搞笑jimmy 演科技天才(印度人已成為聰明的代名詞 ？！)
還是忍不住笑出來

urls.description: The series follows the life of Jimmy Pritchard, a 75-year-old former King County, Washington sheriff
urls.title: Second Chance (2016 TV series) - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

forum.title: 新劇 second chance
